info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:40PM EDT until July 27 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Litchfield County in northern Connecticut... Central Dutchess County in east central New York... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 538 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cornwall Bridge to Fishkill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Torrington, New Milford, Pawling, Pleasant Valley, Thomaston, New Hartford, Amenia, Kent, Sharon, Fishkill, Millbrook, Litchfield, Northwest Harwinton, New Hartford Center, Woodbury Center, Hopewell Junction, Myers Corner, New Preston, Wingdale and Dover Plains. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
